segments.text: I see an indoor kitchen scene, clearly daytime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective gives me a good view of the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing right in front of the sink, facing left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate with a dish towel, her gaze fixed on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What really catches my eye is the sink, though; itâ€™s completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out in a continuous sheet over the counter and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one foot already submerged in the growing puddle, but she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, as if nothing unusual is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's so unaware of the running water and the mess it's creating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause some serious water damage to the cabinets and floor if it continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a strange sight, this calm domesticity amidst an imminent minor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she might slip and hurt herself on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
